World Trade Organization's push for reform plagued by obstaclesDays before talks that could decide its future role in setting the rules for global commerce in an era of rising protectionism, the World Trade Organization is snagged on what to do with its "non-meetings". Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:13:49 GMT VVLJMVJTPVM5VKTXR6VYTMRGWU https://www.reuters.com/business/world-trade-organizations-push-reform-plagued-by-obstacles-2024-02-21/Emma Farge商业
Exclusive: US targets China's top chipmaking plant after Huawei Mate 60 Pro, sources sayThe Biden administration is turning up the heat on China's top sanctioned chipmaker by cutting off its most advanced factory from more American imports after it produced a sophisticated chip for Huawei's Mate 60 Pro phone, three people familiar with the matter said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:09:37 GMT ZY43V233W5K7DN626TYIUJL24Q https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-targets-chinas-top-chipmaking-plant-after-huawei-mate-60-pro-sources-say-2024-02-21/Alexandra Alper, Karen Freifeld技术
With Currys buyout, China's JD.com could get hungered short-cut to Europe expansionIf JD.com does acquire British electronics retailer Currys , the Chinese ecommerce giant JD.com would get the store and warehouse network it needs to expand rapidly in the UK and Europe, at a bargain-basement price. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 11:19:36 GMT DQTA6U62OFLPBEC2KYZXZHHB4 https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/with-currys-buyout-chinas-jdcom-could-get-hungered-short-cut-europe-expansion-2024-02-21/Casey Hall, Sophie Yu, Helen Reid可持续发展可持续财务与报告

Chinese, Indian militaries hold 'constructive' meeting on border issues - ministryThe Chinese and Indian militaries held a constructive meeting on resolving border issues on Monday, China's defence ministry said in a statement. Russia is biggest security threat to NATO-hopeful Sweden, security service saysRussia is the main international security threat to Sweden, and foreign enemies may try to exploit an elevated risk of extremist violence from Islamists and the far right, the Swedish security service said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 10:26:13 GMT XSYA26G2CVOLJLHIPMAQJTET5I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-is-biggest-security-threat-nato-hopeful-sweden-security-service-says-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Red Sea ballistic missile attacks trigger Asian interest in defencesThe use of anti-ship ballistic missiles (ASBMs) in the Red Sea has spurred interest in Asia about the systems used to shoot them down, experts and industry officials say - although China, with its huge ASBM arsenal, presents a tougher challenge. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:39:05 GMT U6425OGZPZOB3E2A7SQBPUVUME https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/red-sea-ballistic-missile-attacks-trigger-asian-interest-defences-2024-02-21/Gerry Doyle世界亚太地区
On frontline Taiwan islands, fishermen wary of China tensionsTaiwanese fishermen in sensitive waters around frontline islands near the Chinese coast say they are worried about rising tensions, after two Chinese nationals died during a chase with Taiwan's coast guard. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:02:55 GMT UXJ4Z36N7NJNFJN4RSJC3VIRLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/frontline-taiwan-islands-fishermen-wary-china-tensions-2024-02-21/Ann Wang, Walid Berrazeg世界亚太地区
China's vice foreign minister Ma Zhaoxu to attend G20 in BrazilChina's Vice Foreign Minister Ma Zhaoxu will attend the G20 foreign ministers' meeting from Feb. 21 to 22 in Rio de Janeiro, a spokesperson for the foreign ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 08:55:51 GMT 2CIABPMQUNO67FX7OCKLAKSQ2M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-vice-foreign-minister-ma-zhaoxu-attend-g20-brazil-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
China's childcare costs among highest in world, think tank saysChina is one of the world's most expensive places to raise a child, relative to its GDP per capita, a prominent Chinese think tank said on Wednesday as it detailed the time and opportunity costs for women who opt to have children in the country. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:58:42 GMT WQJBUYNEZRJCNNIXEGKVFAERSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-childcare-costs-among-highest-world-think-tank-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
Australia loses out as Chinese tourists flock to Southeast AsiaAs Chinese tourism booms to visa-free countries in Southeast Asia, Australia is losing out, with more cost-conscious mainland travellers also choosing cheaper destinations closer to home, according to tour operators and industry data. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:13:54 GMT RGKC3IAQPJJHLDF5IBYDEQZGGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-loses-out-chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
